analysis.key_quote: Reclassifying tens of thousands of federal employees into an at-will employment category is not “reform”—it’s a transparent attempt to turn the professional civil service into a political loyalty test.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about politicization, the integrity of the civil service, and the potential loss of institutional knowledge. It emphasizes the importance of a nonpartisan civil service and the risks posed by the rule.
